name: Find My Cheese
description:
Find my Cheese! Alpha Release

A simple puzzle game inspired by Castle Mouse Pizmo Games©. Help the mouse find its cheese to complete the level.

Animals scare certain adjacent other animals, in order:

  • Elephant
  • Lion
  • Bear
  • Dog
  • Cat
  • Mouse

And the Mouse in turn scares the Elephant.

Features:

  • A dozen levels of increasing difficulty!
  • Music can be disabled
  • 3 camera angles

Link To Web Player Version
